Posts.EditableText:
I have released version 3.0 of CombatLib. This is the version that is actually used in Deeper (previous versions were steps on the way to Deeper). I have also produced a tutorial that will walk you through the steps of creating equipment, monsters, spells and magic items.

https://github.com/ThePix/quest/wiki/CombatLib
Posts.HTML:
I have released version 3.0 of CombatLib. This is the version that is actually used in Deeper (previous versions were steps on the way to Deeper). I have also produced a tutorial that will walk you through the steps of creating equipment, monsters, spells and magic items.

https://github.com/ThePix/quest/wiki/CombatLib
